content:
DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl Class

In this Article

Represents the hosted combo box control in a DataGridViewComboBoxCell.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ClassInterface(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ClassInterfaceType.AutoDispatch)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
public class DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl : System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox, System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • MarshalByRefObject
  • Component
  • Control
  • ListControl
  • System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox
  • DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl

Remarks

The DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl class is a specialized type of ComboBox that implements the IDataGridViewEditingControl interface, allowing it to be hosted in a DataGridViewComboBoxCell when the cell is in edit mode. When a DataGridViewComboBoxCell is in edit mode, you can retrieve the DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl through the EditingControl property of the DataGridView control.

Handle the EditingControlShowing event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode. To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the CellStyle property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the Control property.

Constructors summary

DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl()

Initializes a new instance of the DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl class.

Properties summary

EditingControlDataGridView

Gets or sets the DataGridView that contains the combo box control.
EditingControlFormattedValue

Gets or sets the formatted representation of the current value of the control.
EditingControlRowIndex

Gets or sets the index of the owning cell's parent row.
EditingControlValueChanged

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current value of the control has changed.
EditingPanelCursor

Gets the cursor used during editing.
RepositionEditingControlOnValueChange

Gets a value indicating whether the cell contents need to be repositioned whenever the value changes.

Methods summary

ApplyCellStyleToEditingControl(DataGridViewCellStyle)

Changes the control's user interface (UI) to be consistent with the specified cell style.
EditingControlWantsInputKey(Keys,Boolean)

Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key that the editing control should process or a special key that the DataGridView should process.
GetEditingControlFormattedValue(DataGridViewDataErrorContexts)

Retrieves the formatted value of the cell.
OnSelectedIndexChanged(EventArgs)

Raises the SelectedIndexChanged event.
PrepareEditingControlForEdit(Boolean)

Prepares the currently selected cell for editing.

Constructors

  • DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl()

    Initializes a new instance of the DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl class.

    public DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl ();

    Remarks

    This default constructor sets the TabStop property to false.

    Application code typically will not explicitly create instances of the DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl class, because this is performed automatically when the containing DataGridViewComboBoxCell is created.

Properties

  • EditingControlDataGridView

    Gets or sets the DataGridView that contains the combo box control.

    public virtual System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView EditingControlDataGridView { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • DataGridView

      The DataGridView that contains the DataGridViewComboBoxCell that contains this control; otherwise, null if there is no associated DataGridView.

    Remarks

    This property is automatically set when a DataGridViewComboBoxColumn or DataGridViewComboBoxCell is created within a DataGridView or added to a DataGridView.

  • EditingControlFormattedValue

    Gets or sets the formatted representation of the current value of the control.

    public virtual object EditingControlFormattedValue { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Object

      An object representing the current value of this control.

    Remarks

    The Text property contains the actual data contained in the control. This data is the string shown in the text box portion of the control. In contrast, the GetEditingControlFormattedValue method returns the formatted representation of this string. Because a combo box uses plain text strings, these two properties are essentially the same.

  • EditingControlRowIndex

    Gets or sets the index of the owning cell's parent row.

    public virtual int EditingControlRowIndex { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The index of the row that contains the owning cell; -1 if there is no owning row.

    Remarks

    The row index of the column headers row is -1.

    The row index of a shared row is also -1.

  • EditingControlValueChanged

    Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current value of the control has changed.

    public virtual bool EditingControlValueChanged { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the value of the control has changed; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    The EditingControlValueChanged property is set to true to specify that the owning cell's value has changed, and the cell may need to be updated to reflect this change. The owning cell or table will reset this property to false after it has updated itself.

    When the control is initialized, this property is set to false.

  • EditingPanelCursor

    Gets the cursor used during editing.

    public virtual System.Windows.Forms.Cursor EditingPanelCursor { get; }

    Property Value

    • Cursor

      A Cursor that represents the cursor image used by the mouse pointer during editing.

  • RepositionEditingControlOnValueChange

    Gets a value indicating whether the cell contents need to be repositioned whenever the value changes.

    public virtual bool RepositionEditingControlOnValueChange { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      false in all cases.

Methods

  • ApplyCellStyleToEditingControl(DataGridViewCellStyle)

    Changes the control's user interface (UI) to be consistent with the specified cell style.

    public virtual void ApplyCellStyleToEditingControl (System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle dataGridViewCellStyle);

    Parameters

    • dataGridViewCellStyle
      DataGridViewCellStyle

      The DataGridViewCellStyle to use as a pattern for the UI.

    Remarks

    The Font, BackColor, and ForeColor properties of the control align with the corresponding properties of the dataGridViewCellStyle parameter value.

  • EditingControlWantsInputKey(Keys,Boolean)

    Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key that the editing control should process or a special key that the DataGridView should process.

    public virtual bool EditingControlWantsInputKey (System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData, bool dataGridViewWantsInputKey);

    Parameters

    • keyData
      Keys

      A bitwise combination of Keys values that represents the key that was pressed.

    • dataGridViewWantsInputKey
      Boolean

      true to indicate that the DataGridView control can process the key; otherwise, false.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the specified key is a regular input key that should be handled by the editing control; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    The DataGridView control calls this method to determine whether to handle an input key or let the editing control handle it.

    This method returns true if keyData includes the Keys or Keys values or if the drop-down list is displayed and keyData includes the Keys or Keys values. This method also returns true if dataGridViewWantsInputKey is false. Otherwise, this method returns false.

  • GetEditingControlFormattedValue(DataGridViewDataErrorContexts)

    Retrieves the formatted value of the cell.

    public virtual object GetEditingControlFormattedValue (System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts context);

    Parameters

    • context
      DataGridViewDataErrorContexts

      A bitwise combination of DataGridViewDataErrorContexts values that specifies the data error context.

    Returns

    • Object

      An Object that represents the formatted version of the cell contents.

  • OnSelectedIndexChanged(EventArgs)

    Raises the SelectedIndexChanged event.

    protected override void OnSelectedIndexChanged (EventArgs e);

    Parameters

    • e
      EventArgs

      An EventArgs that contains the event data.

  • PrepareEditingControlForEdit(Boolean)

    Prepares the currently selected cell for editing.

    public virtual void PrepareEditingControlForEdit (bool selectAll);

    Parameters

    • selectAll
      Boolean

      true to select all of the cell's content; otherwise, false.
